text:
ROOT.war does not correctly unpack if it contains a META-INF\context.xml with a
path="" attribute set in the Context element. The context.xml gets correctly
copied to the conf\Catalina\localhost directly and named as ROOT.xml, but the
war file is not unpacked and the application is not deployed.
creator: tcdev2201@log1.net
yoavs@computer.org
text: Are you sure you have unpackWARs="true" in your Host definition?

Yes, all other wars unpack and deploy correctly. Only the case I mention fails.
My host configurations alway have:

unpackWARs="true" autoDeploy="true" xmlValidation="false" xmlNamespaceAware="false"

Thanks.
creator: tcdev2201@log1.net

text:
I think you must put a docBase in the context.xml file.  You can use 
docBase="ROOT.war" in this case.  I'm attaching an example and closing this 
item as WORKSFORME (I tested Tomcat 5.0.28).
